![[*Potamonautes ngoyensis*](https://www.iucnredlist.org/species/176993126/178424205), was described in 2022 as an endemic to the Ngoye Forest in KwaZulu-Natal, South Africa. It was assessed as Vulnerable under sub-criterion D2. One of only three threatened freshwater crabs in South Africa, all restricted to forest fragments. (© Sharon Louw)](./imgs/Potamonautes ngoyensis_Savel.png){fig-align="center"}
